entries.journal_entry_description: Obi-wan Kenobi has asked that you visit his former home on Tatooine.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Greetings, young one. Your talent at understanding and manipulating the Force is impressive. Please journey to my former home on Tatooine. Once there, you shall receive a bestowment from me as a token of respect.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Journey to the home on Tatooine in which Obi-wan Kenobi lived as Ben Kenobi.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Enter the small tent that is next to the stone hut.
entries.task03_waypoint_name: Small Tent Beside Ben Kenobi's Hut
entries.task04_item_name: Inside is a jedi robe for you.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Open the wardrobe and look inside.
